@graph.name: GigaScience_PepQuery2_demonstration_STS26T_neoantigen_candidates_workflow
@graph.description:
Validate the NeoAntigen Candidates from FragPipe discovery through the PepQuery Novel search

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Neoantigen 4: PepQuery2 Verification](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/neoantigen-4-peptide-verification/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
